snippet.title: How Aaron Levie and his childhood friends built Box into a $2 billion business, without stabbing each other in the back
snippet.description: One of the most hotly-anticipated tech IPOs of 2014 is run by four childhood classmates who grew up and built a cloud computing juggernaut during their 20s.

snippet.title: Purchasing equipment is made easier with the help of Apple's Business Teams
snippet.description: Erik Eckel takes a look at Apple's Business Team, which he believes is a convenient and cost-effective option when purchasing Apple equipment.

snippet.title: Top IT job skills for 2014: Big data, mobile, cloud, security
snippet.description: The IT job market is on the rise, and top jobs include anything in big data, mobile, cloud or security. Learn more about the latest hiring trends with TechRepublic's roundtable of ...

snippet.title: 10 things I miss about old technology
snippet.description: Take a trip down memory lane as Scott Matteson shares some of his favorite memories about technology from way-back-when.

snippet.title: Predictions for Asian technology in 2014
snippet.description: James Sanders takes a look at the realm of Asian technology and the variety of shiny new products to hit stores over the next year.

snippet.title: How Israel is rewriting the future of cybersecurity and creating the next Silicon Valley
snippet.description: If you're looking for the rise the next Silicon Valley, the place to watch is the Negev region in Israel. Its new cybersecurity juggernaut is breaking new ground in public-private ...

snippet.title: xScope Browser Pro: Full-featured, fast, one-handed browsing
snippet.description: Take a look at how to install and configure xScope Browser Pro, an inexpensive but powerful app for your Android mobile device.

snippet.title: How the Chromebook succeeds beyond all other Linux distributions
snippet.description: The Chromebook has taken off. It's a Linux-based device that has one key thing in its favor. Jack Wallen explains what he thinks it is.

snippet.title: The realities of mobility and hitting the road
snippet.description: Over the past couple of years, the increase in connectivity has even changed the way people go on holidays.

snippet.title: The Honey Chrome extension: An example of what's new and better
snippet.description: A Chrome extension called Honey can automatically find coupon codes to apply during your online checkouts. Find out how it works and how it came to be.
